#New data source:
# https://www.whitehouse.gov/omb/budget/historical-tables/
# Still Table 10.1, Composite Outlet Deflators, Total Column
# (Fiscal year 2012 = 1.0, 2023-2028 are estimates)
# note a random date entry "TQ" that you may need to delete in the 1970s
#Old data source:
# https://www.govinfo.gov/content/pkg/BUDGET-2017-TAB/pdf/BUDGET-2017-TAB.pdf
# Table 10.1—GROSS DOMESTIC PRODUCT AND DEFLATORS USED IN THE HISTORICAL TABLES: 1940–2021
# (Fiscal Year 2009 = 1.000, 2016+ were estimates)
# Column: Composite Outlay Deflators, Other Grants
